article_title: Elections Set for Primary, March Ballot Heavy on Republican Races

article_metadata.author: David Sinclair/Managing Editor

og.description: The political filing period began with a flurry of candidates seeking five seats on the school board, and it ended at noon Monday with one more joining the field.
og.title: Elections Set for Primary, March Ballot Heavy on Republican Races
